description.fr: Vaincre tous les Bouftous. \--- {%FightStarted} Construit un {ObjectMechanism:1063} par héros en jeu. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Téléporte les {ObjectMechanism:1063,plural:other} à 2 cases et en diagonale des héros.
description.en: Defeat all the Gobballs. \--- {%FightStarted} Builds one {ObjectMechanism:1063} per hero in play. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Teleports the {ObjectMechanism:1063,plural:other} 2 cells away diagonally from the heroes.
description.es: Vencer a todos los jalatós. \--- {%FightStarted} Construye un {ObjectMechanism:1063} por héroe en juego. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Teletransporta a los {ObjectMechanism:1063,plural:other} a 2 casillas en diagonal de los héroes.
description.de: Besiege alle Fresssäcke. \--- {%FightStarted} Errichtet einen {ObjectMechanism:1063} pro Helden im Spiel. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Teleportiert die {ObjectMechanism:1063,plural:other} auf 2 Felder und diagonal zu den Helden.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Papatudos. \--- {%FightStarted} Posiciona um {ObjectMechanism:1063} por herói em jogo. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Teletransporta os {ObjectMechanism:1063,plural:other} a 2 células e na diagonal dos heróis.
